import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"; import productcontext from "../context/Productcontext"; import StarRatings from "react-star-ratings"; import Navbar from "./Navbar"; const {Link} = require("react-router-dom"); export default function Productdetails() { const { singleproduct,addid ,addtocart} = useContext(productcontext); const[size,setsize]=useState() const[quantity,setquantity]=useState(6) const onclick=async()=>{ await addtocart(addid) } const onchange=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); setsize({ ...size,[e.target.name]:e.target.value }) console.log(size) } const onplus=()=>{ setquantity(quantity+1) console.log() } return ( <>
